title: Twister Collection 1941 Novelty Press
description:
this is a PD Character that Alex ross revamped, so I gathered up his OG appearances.  This is missing only 1 issue which I cannot find anywhere.  Enjoy

Golden Age Origin 
When he was 14, Bob Sanders' parents were killed when a tornado hits their hometown of Windy Gap. Bob gets caught up in the tornado and finds that the experience has made him a part of the cyclone itself. Using his strange new powers for the good of mankind, he becomes the Twister. He aided Blue Bolt and Sub-Zero shortly after his debut. The Twister can fly, and one punch from him can send a villain crashing through a wall. Whirling his arms can create a tornado strong enough to carry cars or move them along at super speed. He also carries a Cyclone Gun that shoots powerful bursts of air. Breathing in the wind allows him to manipulate and amplify the wind at will.

Golden Age Appearances 
Blue Bolt Comics Vol 2 #1-7
